languages.text: "Подумай хорошенько — хочешь ли ты ослушаться Вольного Торговца со всей моей силой. Стоит мне отдать приказ — и от всей вашей колонии даже пепла не останется".

"Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."
languages.original_text: "Подумай хорошенько — хочешь ли ты ослушаться Вольного Торговца со всей моей силой. Стоит мне отдать приказ — и от всей вашей колонии даже пепла не останется".

traits.locale_text: "Think hard on this — whether or not you want to defy a Rogue Trader and the power at my disposal. I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."
"Think hard on this — whether or not you want to defy a Rogue Trader and the power at my disposal. I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

"Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

"Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

"Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

languages.text: “你再好好想想，你真的要违逆行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的力量吗？我只要一声令下，你的整个殖民地就会被夷为平地，连一丁点灰渣都不会剩下。”
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

traits.locale_text: “你再好好想想，你真的要违逆行商浪人与{mf|他|她}的力量吗？我只要一声令下，你的整个殖民地就会被夷为平地，连一丁点灰渣都不会剩下。”

languages.text: «Piénselo bien: ¿de verdad quiere desafiar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y todo el poder que tiene a su disposición? Solo tengo que dar una orden y no quedarán ni cenizas de toda esta colonia».
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

traits.locale_text: «Piénselo bien: ¿de verdad quiere desafiar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente y todo el poder que tiene a su disposición? Solo tengo que dar una orden y no quedarán ni cenizas de toda esta colonia».

languages.text: 「さあ、よく考えろ — お前は本当に自由開拓者に、自由開拓者が意のままに使えるすべての力に逆らうつもりか？{mf|俺|私}はただ命令するだけでいい。それだけで、お前のコロニーは燃えカス一つ残らない」
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、よく考えろ — お前は本当に自由開拓者に、自由開拓者が意のままに使えるすべての力に逆らうつもりか？{mf|俺|私}はただ命令するだけでいい。それだけで、お前のコロニーは燃えカス一つ残らない」

languages.text: "Denkt jetzt gut nach – wollt Ihr Euch wirklich {mf|einem Freihändler und all seiner|einer Freihändlerin und all ihrer} Macht widersetzen? Ich muss nur den Befehl erteilen, und von Eurer ganzen Kolonie bleibt nicht einmal Glut übrig."
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt jetzt gut nach – wollt Ihr Euch wirklich {mf|einem Freihändler und all seiner|einer Freihändlerin und all ihrer} Macht widersetzen? Ich muss nur den Befehl erteilen, und von Eurer ganzen Kolonie bleibt nicht einmal Glut übrig."

languages.text: « Prenez bien le temps de réfléchir... Souhaitez-vous vraiment défier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et toute la puissance dont {mf|il|elle} dispose ? Il me suffit d'un mot et votre colonie tout entière sera réduite en poussière. »
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."

traits.locale_text: « Prenez bien le temps de réfléchir... Souhaitez-vous vraiment défier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et toute la puissance dont {mf|il|elle} dispose ? Il me suffit d'un mot et votre colonie tout entière sera réduite en poussière. »

languages.text: "İyi düşün bakalım... Tüm gücüyle bir Hür Tacir'e karşı gelmek istediğinden emin misin? Tek lafıma bakar, koloninde taş üstünde taş bırakmam."
languages.original_text: "Think carefully now — are you sure you want to defy a Rogue Trader and all the power {mf|he|she} has at {mf|his|her} disposal? I need but give the order — and there won't be a single cinder left of your entire colony."
